attributes.action: provide grants to help single parents to start up their own business...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Single parents who don't work need a better insentive to go back to work. At the moment it is not worth it, We may gain a little bit of money but then if we go back to work we have to pay full council Tax so that extra money we would get, has gone ! So if there was a grant available for single parents to start their own business then you'd have far less unemployed...
